verses.verse: Save <WH3467> me, <WH430> God, by your name. <WH8034> Vindicate <WH1777> me in your might. <WH1369>
Hear <WH8085> my prayer, <WH8605> God. <WH430> Listen <WH238> to the words <WH561> of my mouth. <WH6310>
For strangers <WH2114> have risen up <WH6965> against me. <WH6184> Violent men have sought <WH1245> after my soul. <WH5315> They haven't <WH7760> set God <WH430> before them. <WH5542> Selah.
Behold, <WH430> God is my helper. <WH5826> The Lord <WH136> is the one <WH5315> who sustains my soul. <WH5315>
He will repay <WH7725> the evil <WH7451> to my enemies. <WH8324> Destroy <WH6789> them in your truth. <WH571>
With a free will offering, <WH5071> I will sacrifice <WH2076> to you. <WH3034> I will give thanks to your name, <WH8034> Yahweh, <WH3068> for it is good. <WH2896>
For he has delivered <WH5337> me out of all trouble. <WH6869> My eye <WH5869> has seen <WH7200> triumph over my enemies. <WH341>
